name: Paint It Block FREE! (with puzzle creator)
name_original: Paint It Block FREE! (with puzzle creator)
description:
Have fun and learn with this simple yet challenging brain-twisting puzzle game, designed to test the whole family’s spatial logic skills.

Help Clyde, the brush creature, to choose the correct combinations of parts. If you use the correct tiles, in the correct order, then the result that emerges from the machine will match the target, and fill Clyde with joy.

Otherwise, sadness.

The game also includes the opportunity to express imagination and cunning, with a pattern editor to create your own puzzle combinations to share with your friends and family.

KEY FEATURES
•From the makers of carcophony, BlindGiRl and Inquisition Earth!
•Hundreds of brain twisting puzzles.
•Free, easy to use, and fun for all.
•Learn by experiment – try out and review old attempts in a safe environment.
•Develop an essential foundation in spatial reasoning, problem solving and visualisation.
•Increasingly challenging puzzles and stages, eventually including rotation, reflection and even colour-switching modes.
•Includes a puzzle editor to create original combinations to challenge your friends.
•More free puzzle levels still being developed – automatically updated and coming soon!
